1.title: Crow Released Today : 1 oct 2018 cms
1.description:
1. Download php client for crow from https://github.com/naveen17797/crow-web-client
  2. Extract the zip file in your local host and rename the folder to any name you like
  3. If you are using linux distribution, make sure you set file permissions to 777 for crow directory
  4. Now navigate to page https://localhost/[FOLDER_NAME]
You will be asked to enter the github user access token, watch the below video to know how to the access token
1.author: naveen17797
